pr_title: Allow users to sort, change column width and position in edit location window

timeline.message:
Allow users to sort, change column width and position edit location
tables.
Fix null pointer exception during testing

timeline.bodyText:
Is this reformatting done by purpose? Sometimes this can happen because some setting in the editor gets change by misstake.
If you want the formatting this way, I will not argue against it. But I don't think this is how JMRI usually format switch case statements.
timeline.author: danielb987

replies.bodyText: That's the way my IDE does it, but it also looks like the  standard format.   It's only a spacing issue with the reformatting.
replies.author: DanielBoudreau

replies.bodyText: Now I see that the case statements are no longer indented.  Not sure why, in the past using the same IDE, it has been.  Something has changed, but not by me.
replies.author: DanielBoudreau

replies.bodyText: Found and fixed the formatting issue with my IDE. Thanks for bring it to my attention.
replies.author: DanielBoudreau
